sense.gloss: ordinary, average, common, normal, like the average person, like most people

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑人並↑↓|ひとな↓み|の↑楽↑↓らく↓もできない。
sdata.e: He cannot afford the common comforts of life.

sdata.j: ↑人波↑↓|ひとなみ|↓にもまれて↑友人↑↓ゆうじん↓とはぐれた。
sdata.e: My friend and I were separated in the jostle of the surging crowd.
